[ATTACH]33844[/ATTACH][ATTACH]33845[/ATTACH][ATTACH]33846[/ATTACH]Here is stuff. CRAZY STUFF

Okay, I have made a fully booster plane. suprizingly stable.

Features eject system on S version.

Micro:

NOTE: That is 2.0 version, yet it only saved the 1.0 version. no problem to fix tho, just attach 2 more sets of canards on top, and repositon landing gear

How-to fly:

Its hard, but its easy once you fix it to 2.0 version (maybe i already did fix it but it overwrote the other one)

step one: turn on RCS

step 2: pulse the H key

step 3: use j and l to keep it on course.

step 4: PRAY

step 5: liftoff! (it can land, if you are skilled)

Mods used:

Novapunch for booster plane

Modular wheels for micro.
